scripts.c: cd cordova && cordova platform add android && cd ..
scripts.d: cd cordova && cordova platform remove ios && cd ..
scripts.e: cd cordova && cordova prepare android && cd ..
scripts.plugin: cd cordova && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-dialogs && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-device-name && cd ..
scripts.firstTime: cordova create cordova && cd cordova && cordova platform add android && cd .. && npm run webpack && cd cordova && cordova prepare android && cordova run android && cd ..
scripts.firstTime1: cordova create cordova && cd cordova && cordova platform add android && cd .. && npm run webpack
scripts.reload: cd cordova && npm run webpack && cordova prepare android && cordova run android && cd ..
scripts.relBro: cd cordova && npm run webpack && cordova prepare browser && cordova run browser && cd ..
scripts.updateAndroid: cd cordova && cordova platform update android && cd ..
